resume_content:
# Personal
Ankit Tater
Engineering Manager | AI/ML | Cloud Architecture | Digital Transformation
London, United Kingdom

# About
Engineering leader with 12+ years of experience in building and scaling high-performance teams across AI/ML, Cloud Architecture, and Digital Transformation.

Passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex business problems and drive innovation. Known for building scalable, secure, and performant systems that deliver business value.

# Experience
Engineering Manager - Healthtech at Huma Therapeutics (Jan 2023 - Present)
Led cross-functional teams (ML, data, devs) to drive scalable AI-powered SaMD solutions and healthtech innovation.
Architecting Cloud-Native, Regulatory-Compliant Healthtech Systems at Huma
Expanded into new markets with regulatory compliance expertise
Implemented DORA metrics to drive high-performance engineering
OKR-driven, metrics-focused culture to align engineering efforts with business objectives

Engineering Manager - Software Services at Encora Digital Inc. (May 2020 - Dec 2022)
Managed multimillion $ budgets, scaled global teams
Agile transformation boosted launch speed 35%
Migrated monolithic applications to microservices, reducing deployment time by 40%
Founded "Knowledge-Sharing Friday", improved collaboration 40%

Co-founder & Technical Lead – Fintech at Wetech Digital (Jan 2019 - May 2020)
Integrated with MoneyHub, Morningstar, optimized speed 30%
Led engineering in regulated financial environments

CTO at iSuraksha Solutions (Dec 2014 - Jul 2018)
Built a cloud-native, scalable IoT platform for a leading automotive manufacturer, enabling real-time data processing and analytics.
Built and scale an engineering team of 10+ developers
Built a system of real-time processing of huge telemetry data from IoT devices

# Skills
Programming Languages: Java, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript

Frameworks & Libraries: Django, Flask, Spring Boot, JMeter, ReactJS, Node.js, Express, Nest.js, Next.js, React Native, Cordova, Ionic

Databases & Data Pipelines: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra, Apache Spark, Apache Kafka

Cloud & Infrastructure: AWS, EC2, ECS, Lambda, S3, CloudFormation, Azure, AKS, OpenStack, DynamoDB, Google App Engine, Firebase, Google Cloud Functions, Digital Ocean

AI & ML Technologies: LLM, OpenAI, Langchain, Hugging Face, Clade, CrewAI, n8n, flowise

Microservices & API Design: RESTful APIs, gRPC, Pub/Sub (Kafka), API Gateway, OAuth 2.0, JWT, Swagger/OpenAPI, Event Driven Systems

Monitoring & Observability: New Relic, Prometheus, Grafana, DataDog, App Dynamics, PagerDuty, Opsgenie, SLAs/SLOs

High Performance Systems: High-Throughput, Low-Latency, Distributed Computing, Caching Strategies, Load Balancing, Connection Pooling

# Projects
Healthcare Platform for SaMD
Architected and built a cloud-native, regulatory-compliant SaMD platform for Huma Therapeutics, reducing development time by 50% and improving scalability.
Technologies: Python, Angular, Kubernetes, Cloud-Native, Microservices, Performance Monitoring

Microservices Migration
Led a team that migrated a monolithic application to a microservices architecture, reducing deployment time by 40%. Implemented comprehensive performance monitoring with custom dashboards and alerting systems to ensure high availability. Established incident management protocols that reduced MTTR from 5 hours to under 60 minutes.
Technologies: Kubernetes, Docker, Azure, Java, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, Microservices, API Gateway, OpenAPI, Kafka, RabbitMQ, Redis, MySQL, PostgreSQL, High Availability, Incident Management

IoT Platform for Telemetry Data
Built a cloud-native, scalable IoT platform for a leading automotive manufacturer, enabling real-time data processing and analytics. Engineered a high-throughput system processing over 1M data points per minute with sophisticated caching strategies and load balancing to ensure consistent performance under peak loads.
Technologies: Java, Node.js, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, Microservices, Kafka, RabbitMQ, Redis, MySQL, High-Throughput, Performance Optimization

Fintech Integration Platform
Developed a secure platform integrating with financial services APIs including MorningHub, Morningstar, and other financial data providers. Implemented PCI DSS compliance and improved data retrieval speed by 30%.
Technologies: Java, Micronaut, OAuth2, Financial APIs

# Education
PGP in AI & Machine Learning from University of Texas at Austin (2025)
Specialized in deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing. Completed capstone project on healthcare predictive analytics.

B.E. in Information Technology from JNTU Hyderabad (2012)
Graduated with distinction. Final project on distributed systems earned university recognition.

# Certifications
MongoDB SI Associate (October 2022)
Expertise in database design, optimization, and integration

Azure AZ-900 (June 2022)
Cloud fundamentals and Azure services certification

AWS Certified Solutions Architect (In Progress)
Designing distributed systems on AWS infrastructure

# Engineering Excellence
Engineering Leadership Philosophy
My approach to engineering leadership is built on creating systems and processes that empower teams to deliver exceptional results while maintaining technical excellence.

DORA Metrics Achievements
Improved key engineering performance indicators across teams:

OKR Implementation Impact
Strategic alignment through Objectives and Key Results framework:
